name: AE 3D Motor: Moto Bike Racing,Road Rage to Car Run

description:
AE 3D Motor, the ONLY popular moto racing game for all three major mobile platforms. No matter what phone you are using, you have AE 3D Motor.

Thank you all for your downloads:
*** AE 3D Motor is/has been the No 1. overall free game in Japan for iPhone
*** AE 3D Motor is/has been the No 1. overall free game in China, Taiwan for iPhone
*** AE 3D Motor is/has been the No 1. Racing/Action game in India, Mexico, Russia, Turkey, ... for iPhone
*** AE 3D Motor is/has been the No 1. racing game in Japan for Google Play Store
*** AE 3D Motor is/has been the No 2. racing game in China, Taiwan for for Google Play Store
*** AE 3D Motor is/has been the No 1. overall game in US and many other coutrires for Windows Phone


Let's Racing!

Eye popping beautiful 3D graphics, realistic scenes and vehicles, addictive and crazy gameplay, extremely smooth tilt control, racing motos with various styles as well as awesome vivid sound, which will give you a real motorcycle racing feeling!

Two angles of view, give you two fantastic driving feelings. Wow! So thrilling!

Sunshine beach, cereus desert and magnificent bridge, three attractive scenes formed first road. And steep cliff, snow mountain, ice river, sunset... so many scenes in later roads: Coastal Highway, Going to the Sun Road, The Road of Fury & Frozen Fantasy.

Maybe you are fond of driving speed car, or you want to be a cool highway rider... Come on to select your own racing moto, driving it like crazy, regardless of traffic rush, Let's real Racing!

Any feedback please email us, because we can't reply on comments. Thanks very much for all your support in our games. Keep your nerve and challenge yourself now!

AE 3D Motor, Moto Racing No Limits!

*This game requires an iPhone4 or newer or an iPad2 or newer device to run. Thanks. *


***HOW TO PLAY***
- Tap screen to speed up your moto at insane speeds and get double scores.
- Tilt your phone left and right to control moto driving direction.
- Watch out the changing traffic and roadside.
- Pass vehicles much closely to get bonus scores.
- Better racing moto, higher score and coins.
- Moto acceleration support 3D Touch.
